title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 July 2015 - XWiki
content:

09:41 <Ramona3> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
10:07 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:15 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:38 <ITzOmE> has joined #xwiki  
10:38 <ITzOmE> Hello there. I am trying to setup a master to master replication with mysql and xwiki. The replication on his side works well. But now when master1 creates a file it will be created on master2 same goes with changes in document and history version goes up and up. But when i have for example version 2.1 at a document and i want to change it on master2 and look it up on master1 there no change, but i replicated the newer version but is s  
10:40 <ClemensR> this might be the hibernate cache  
10:40 <ClemensR> did you install the admin tools:  http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Admin+Tools+Application  
10:41 <ClemensR> this has a "flush cache" page to see if it is a problem with the cache  
10:43 <ITzOmE> has quit  
10:53 <vmassol> hmm not nice  
10:53 <vmassol> he asks a question and then leaves without acknowleding your answer ClemensR :)  
10:54 <ClemensR> maybe he is back investigating and got a chat timeout ? never mind ;)  
10:54 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:55 <vmassol> ClemensR: he just posted on the list actually...  
10:55 <vmassol> so first in jira, then irc then now on the list :)  
10:55 <ClemensR> ah, ok, then maybe he didn't read it here, too short attention span  
10:57 <ClemensR> might answer in the evening, for now I need to get some work done over here ..  
10:58 <vmassol> ClemensR: sure. We haven't seen you for a while, I guess you were busy :) All is going ok on your usage of xwiki?  
10:58 <ClemensR> yes, I am quite busy, unfortunately with another project - well, whatever the customer wants  
10:59 <Ramona3> has quit  
10:59 <ClemensR> maybe I get some more XWiki-related things to to in the not so far away future, we will see  
11:00 <vmassol> ok :)  
11:00 <vmassol> I guess you've seen the work on Nested Spaces that we've started  
11:00 <vmassol> we're all pretty busy on it ATM  
11:00 <vmassol> hope you like it!  
11:00 <ClemensR> there have not been much XWiki BFD's lately, or did I miss something?  
11:00 <vmassol> no you're right  
11:01 <ClemensR> yes, actually some folks asked for nested spaces support somewhat one month ago ;)  
11:01 <vmassol> most of us are currently focused on the nested spaces work till end of september, after which we'll probably push back the BFDs since we're lagging behind on that now  
11:01 <ClemensR> well, yes, if you are pretty busy with nested spaces, then better conceptrae on that  
11:01 <vmassol> now if you wish to push for some BFDs, please do so! :)  
11:02 <ClemensR> yeah, I would if I got the time :-/  ... try to get things done in the quiet summer weeks, I hope I get some spare time soon  
11:03 <vmassol> k  
11:03 <vmassol> np  
11:10 <ClemensR> vmassol: btw, the signature of Mr. Strambini says "computer guy -  in apprenticeship" - so he still has to learn how to ask questions ;)  
11:17 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki  
11:49 <vmassol> :)  
11:49 <vmassol> we all are apprentices in computer though… so much to learn :)
